meanings.definition: (Latin) from the opposite side; conversely; on the other hand
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) from the opposite side; conversely; on the other hand

examples.sentence: Exadverso, the defendant argued that the evidence was circumstantial.
examples.translation: 反対に、被告は証拠が状況証拠であると主張した。

etymology.value: Latin: ex - from, ad - to, versus - turned (past participle of vertere - to turn)
